mapper.insert: insert into forest_product_content(id_product, product_content, product_content_html, created_time, updated_time) values (#{idProduct}, #{productContent}, #{productContentHtml}, sysdate(), sysdate())
mapper.update: update forest_product_content set product_content = #{productContent}, product_content_html = #{productContentHtml}, updated_time = sysdate() where id_product = #{idProduct}
mapper.select: select id, product_title, product_img_url, tags, product_description, product_price, weights, status, created_time from forest_product order by weights

select id, product_title, product_img_url, tags, product_description, product_price, weights, status,
product_content_html as product_content,
product_content,
product_img_url from forest_product fp join forest_product_content fpc on fp.id = fpc.id_product where id = #{idProduct}
